pages.title: What's this?
pages.text: End Remastered changes how you get to the End dimension, because playing vanilla Minecraft with friends proved that progression was a bit too quick for my tastes. $(br2)It is no longer a walk in the park.
You must obtain a total of 12 unique eyes out of the 16 available. $(br2)I should also mention that Strongholds are not exactly small anymore... You will see what I mean when it is time to find one.
